p: The selected medicinal plants: licorice ( G. glabra L.), bullet wood ( M. elengi L.), black cumin ( N. sativa L.), Indian gooseberry ( P. emblica L.), Indian nightshade ( S. indicum L.), Thai nightshade ( S. trilobatum L.), clove bud ( S. aromaticum L.), and mangosteen ( G. mangostana L.) were purchased from herbal shops in Thailand. The voucher specimens were deposited at the Herbarium of the Southern Center of Thai medicinal plants at the Faculty of Pharmaceutical Science, Prince of Songkla University, Songkhla, Thailand. The identities of the herbal materials were done by comparison with the authentic herbarium specimen ( Table 1).
